description:
Shiranui Flare is a http://anidb.net/cr62903 [virtual YouTuber] that has also starred in anime.
A half-elf who seems sloppy and undependable, however when it is time, she becomes an extremely reliable big sis.
She is basically kind of drained. Her weakness is her emotions and she cries or gets embarrassed quite easily (Just praise her!).
Source: Hololive Production
name: Shiranui Flare
